summary: This is an email exchange between Assistant United States Attorney Maurene Comey and defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim regarding urgent communication about Ghislaine Maxwell. The exchange shows coordination between prosecution and defense counsel during Maxwell's legal proceedings.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney representing Ghislaine Maxwell, sending urgent communication to the prosecutor about her client.

persons.name: Maurene Comey
persons.context: Federal prosecutor in the Southern District of New York responding to defense counsel's urgent message about Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the urgent communication between defense attorney and prosecutor, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.

connections.description: Sternheim is identified as Maxwell's defense attorney in this legal correspondence.
Defense attorney and prosecutor communicating about an urgent matter regarding Maxwell's case.
Prosecutor handling the case against Maxwell in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Urgent Communication About Maxwell
events.description: Defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim sends urgent message to prosecutor Maurene Comey regarding Ghislaine Maxwell, with follow-up response about availability.

locations.name: 33 West 19th Street, 4th Floor, New York, NY 10011
locations.context: Law offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim, though noted as closed due to COVID-19

keyFacts: This document shows direct communication between Ghislaine Maxwell's defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim and prosecutor Maurene Comey in November 2020.
The subject line indicates 'URGENT' communication regarding Maxwell, suggesting time-sensitive legal matters during her prosecution.
The correspondence occurred during the COVID-19 pandemic, with Sternheim's office closed but working remotely.
The document reveals the professional contact information for both the defense attorney and federal prosecutor involved in Maxwell's case.
